data.actual_result: Mic Check indicator doesn't light up and Input Sensitivity freezes if you're in a voice call.
data.expected_result: Mic Check indicator and Input Sensitivity should work even if you're in a call.
data.short_description: Mic check indicator not working and input sensitivity freezing while in a voice chat[Browser only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat - Go in to Voice and Video in Settings - Click 'Let's Check' under Mic Check
